text: Yngve Axel Andreas Larsson (9 January 1917 - 22 March 2014) was a Swedish pediatrician, medicine professor and diabetologist. He was best known for his work at the Ethio-Swedish Pediatric Clinic (ESPC) at Haile Selassie I University in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia from 1965 until 1970. He was born in Stockholm. Larsson died from natural causes on 22 March 2014 in Liding√∂. He was 97 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1917 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Swedish academics Category:Scientists from Stockholm Category:Writers from Stockholm Category:Swedish physicians
title: Yngve A. A. Larsson
